title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email, password, and name.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid email address, password, and name.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that registration is successful and user is redirected to the profile or homepage.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify the registration fails with an invalid email address format.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input an invalid email format, valid password, and name.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that an appropriate error message is shown and registration is blocked.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can login successfully with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to the user's dashboard or homepage.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure when incorrect password is provided with registered email.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter registered email and incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails and appropriate error message is displayed without redirection.

title: Search Books by Title
description: Verify search functionality returns correct results when searching by book title.

steps.description: Navigate to the home or browse page.
Enter a valid book title in the search bar and submit.
Verify that search results contain books matching the title queried.

title: Search Books by Author
description: Verify that searching by author returns appropriate books by that author.

steps.description: Navigate to the search page.
Enter an author's name in the search bar and initiate search.
Verify that listed books include those authored by the searched author.

title: Search Books by Category Filter
description: Verify that selecting a category filter returns books only within the chosen category.

steps.description: Navigate to the browse page.
Select a specific book category filter.
Verify that the books shown belong only to the selected category.

title: Random Book Suggestion Button
description: Verify that clicking the randomize button suggests different books randomly each time.

steps.description: Navigate to home or browse page.
Click the random book suggestion button multiple times.
Verify that each click refreshes the suggested book with different selections.

title: Top Books Carousel Functionality
description: Verify that the top books carousel loops smoothly showing trending books with author info.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage containing the top books carousel.
Verify carousel displays trending books with correct author info.
Observe carousel for several loops to ensure infinite looping behavior.
Verify no glitches or stops occur during carousel rotation.

title: Open PDF Reader for a Book
description: Verify the PDF reader opens successfully when a user selects a book to read.

steps.description: Select a book from search results or library.
Open the book to access the PDF reader.
Verify the PDF reader interface loads with the book content displayed.

title: PDF Reader Single Page Mode
description: Verify that the PDF reader displays book pages correctly in single page mode.

steps.description: Open a book in PDF reader.
Switch or ensure reader is in single page mode.
Verify only one page is visible at a time and page navigation works.

title: PDF Reader Two-Page Mode
description: Confirm that two-page view mode correctly displays two pages side by side.

steps.description: Open a book in PDF reader.
Enable two-page mode.
Verify two consecutive pages are displayed side by side with correct navigation.

title: PDF Reader Zoom Controls
description: Verify zoom in and zoom out controls function properly adjusting page size without distortion.

steps.description: Open a book in PDF reader.
Use zoom in control and observe page scaling.
Verify page zooms in smoothly maintaining readability.
Use zoom out control and verify proper page scaling back.
Verify zoom out does not degrade page content visibility.

title: PDF Reader Fullscreen Toggle
description: Verify fullscreen mode toggling works correctly within the PDF reader interface.

steps.description: Open book in PDF reader.
Activate fullscreen toggle.
Verify reader switches to fullscreen mode with interface controls still accessible.
Deactivate fullscreen toggle.
Verify reader returns to normal view without issues.

title: Bookmark a Book and Verify in Personal Library
description: Test bookmarking a book and confirm it appears in the user's personal library dashboard.

steps.description: Login as a registered user.
Search for a book and bookmark it.
Navigate to the personal library dashboard.
Verify the bookmarked book is listed with correct title and author.

title: Update Book Reading Status
description: Verify user can update reading status to Planning to Read, Reading, On Hold, and Completed and status persists correctly.

steps.description: Login and bookmark a book.
Change the book's status to each available status option one by one.
After each update, verify the status is reflected correctly in the personal library.

title: Automatic Saving of Last Read Page
description: Verify the system saves the last read page automatically and restores it on next book visit.

steps.description: Open a book in PDF reader.
Navigate to page 10 or any non-first page.
Close the reader and reopen the same book.
Verify the reader opens to the previously read page (page 10).

title: Dark/Light Theme Toggle Persistence
description: Verify that toggling between dark and light themes saves user preference and persists across sessions.

steps.description: Toggle the theme to dark mode.
Refresh or reopen the website in a new session.
Verify the site loads with dark theme as per last user preference.
Toggle back to light mode and repeat verification for persistence.

title: Text-to-Speech Audio Playback
description: Verify the text-to-speech feature reads the book content aloud without errors and supports pausing and resuming.

steps.description: Open a book in the PDF reader.
Activate the text-to-speech feature.
Verify that the book content is read aloud correctly.
Pause and resume audio playback.
Verify audio pauses and resumes smoothly without glitches.

title: UI Animations and Effects Smoothness
description: Verify page-curling animation, 3D cover effects, magnification, and hover interactions work smoothly on supported devices.

steps.description: Navigate through book pages and observe page-curling animations.
Animations run smoothly without lag or stutter.
Hover over 3D book covers and verify 3D effects activate correctly.
Magnification and hover interactions respond instantly and correctly.

title: Error Handling for 404 Pages
description: Verify user-friendly 404 page is displayed when a non-existent API or book resource is accessed.

steps.description: Manually request a non-existing book or invalid endpoint.
Verify that a user-friendly 404 error page is shown.
Verify the application does not crash and navigation is possible.

title: Graceful Fallback on Connection Loss
description: Verify the application handles network connection loss gracefully without crashing, showing appropriate UI messages.

steps.description: Simulate network disconnection while using the app.
Verify that an error message or fallback UI appears notifying the user about connection issues.
Verify ongoing session data is preserved and user can retry operations.
